name: My Summer Fishing
description:
My Summer Fishing 🎣

PLEASE READ THE CONTROLS BEFORE PLAYING.

This is a small game I created over my Summer break.

Explore the small islands and catch all of the fish in your notebook (TAB)! 

Controls:

You can play with Mouse and Keyboard or a Controller.

WASD or Left Analogue Stick: To Move.

Left Click or South Controller button: To Cast and Reel in your fishing rod.

Fish will bite the hook a few times, but only when it's sunk should you reel them in!

Left Shift or Left shoulder button: To Sprint.

TAB or Select: To open your notebook.

For the best performance please download the Desktop Version! Follow my twitter for more games in the future

 https://twitter.com/samc0leman

Credits:

Assets used:

Royalty sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/.

All other assets are original.
